gameDetails.name: Ashes Reborn: The Duchess of Deception
gameDetails.description: Ashes: The Duchess of Deception, which features new Phoenixborn Victoria Glassfire, is a full, ready-to-play Ashes expansion deck including two conjurations. Victoria requires ten Illusion (purple) dice to play, which are included in the Ashes: Rise of the Phoenixborn base set.
